text.text: Do I have to complete each section of ERB?

You do not! Users can select which sections, and activities within a section, to undertake. The Plan Your Project section helps you figure out what best meets your needs and capacity. You can revisit this section at any time to make changes to your Project Plan.
How do I save my project?
The project you are working on saves directly within the ERB tool as you work through it. You can also download saved work to your desktop or laptop at any point using MyPortfolio.
Will EPA collect any data from me if I use ERB?

No. Once you download the ERB software to your computer, the EPA has no access to it. All the information you enter into ERB is kept within the app. You can decide whether you want to download and save project files to another location on your desktop or laptop.
